about_the_game:
Set sail into the critical early battles of the Pacific campaign of World War II with the Dutch East Indies Mission Pack for Battle Fleet 2. Engage in five pivotal naval encounters of 1942, where Allied and Japanese forces clash over control of the Dutch East Indies. Command fleets in historically accurate scenarios that will test your strategic skills.

Historical Missions:

  • Battle of Badung Strait (Japanese Side): Command a fleet of 2 Japanese destroyers in a daring mission to defend a vulnerable transport ship. Outsmart and evade the overwhelming Allied fleet, using every bit of skill and cunning to escape their pursuit.

  • First Battle of Java Sea (Both Sides): Take command of a massive fleet as the Japanese, defending a critical landing force, while the Allies strive to halt the invasion at all costs. Both sides must inflict as much damage as possible, testing your strategic wits in fierce naval combat. Experience the battle from both Allied and Japanese perspectives, each with unique challenges.

  • Second Battle of Java Sea (Allied Side): Protect the damaged USS Exeter in a heart-pounding nighttime escape. With Japanese ships closing in from every direction, navigate through the darkness, outmaneuver your pursuers, and fight for survival in this high-stakes chase.

  • Battle of Sunda Strait (Allied Side): Lead a daring strike with your small force of 2 ships against an unsuspecting Japanese invasion fleet. Ambush them under the cover of darkness, unleash a barrage of firepower, and cause as much chaos as possible to slow down their relentless advance.

New Features:

  • Light Cruiser Class: Adds versatility with its blend of mobility and firepower—Battle Fleet 2's first new ship class since submarines.

  • Smoke Generators: Equip ships to deploy smoke screens, hiding your fleet and adding a new stealth element to your tactics.

Why Choose This Pack?

  • Authentic Battles: For the first time ever, Battle Fleet 2 now features historical missions based on actual WWII battles. Each mission presents a unique challenge, perfect for BF2 veterans looking for a new test of their skills. These missions are single-player only, offering an immersive, historically grounded experience.

  • New Tactical Options: With the new Light Cruiser and Smoke Generator, the entire game is enhanced. This DLC is required to unlock these features, which can be used in all game modes to expand your fleet and adapt your strategies with new units and capabilities.

The Dutch East Indies Mission Pack is packed with thrilling new content that transforms your strategic options and brings WWII history to life. With new ship classes, tactical tools, and legendary battles, this expansion is a must-have for any commander seeking to dominate the seas and outthink their rivals.
